step_feedback.feedback: Good start! Keep your hands clasped comfortably in your lap.
Nice job raising your hands. Try to keep your elbows a little closer together as you bring them towards your forehead.
You're spreading your elbows well. Focus on keeping your head upright and avoid pulling your hands forward.
Holding steady! Remember to keep your head upright and avoid pulling forward.
Great job returning to the start. You're doing well with this movement.
Second rep, looking good. Hands clasped in your lap, ready to go.
Well done raising your hands. Continue to focus on keeping those elbows close as you move towards your forehead.
Excellent spread of the elbows! Remember the tip to keep your head upright and avoid pulling forward.
Holding the position. Keep your head up and maintain that elbow spread.
Fantastic return to the starting position. You've completed both repetitions with good form.

exercise_summary: You did a great job with the Clasp and Spread exercise! Remember to keep your head upright and avoid pulling your hands forward. Focus on keeping your elbows close when raising your hands towards your forehead.
